cause.description:
Since 1999, Falun Gong practitioners in China have been systematically persecuted by the Chinese Communist Party.
There are more than 3,300 known deaths from torture. Between 200,000 and one million people have been illegally sent to forced labour camps without trials.
Falun Gong is a peaceful qigong and meditation practice based on the universal principles of truth, compassion and tolerance.
It is practised freely in more than 70 countries by over 100 million people. All except its country of origin - China.
The torture, genocide, and organ harvesting of Falun Gong practitioners by the Chinese Communist Party must stop, with the perpetrators brought to justice.
The world needs truth, compassion and tolerance.
www.faluninfo.net
www.organharvestinvestigation.net
1. The Chinese Communist Party must end its persecution of Falun Gong.
2. Live organ harvesting from Falun Gong practitioners must stop.
3. The perpetrators of this crime against humanity must be brought to justice.
cause.mission: On July 20 1999, Falun Gong was banned in China. More than 11 years later, brainwashing, torture and killing of Falun Gong adherents are commonplace. This genocide must end.
cause.name: Stop the persecution of Falun Gong
